Question.Subject: Miramar? are they just making these places up?

ChosenAnswer: Well you say Miramar I say Piramar MIRAMAR PIRAMAR Lets call the whole thing off.

Answers.Answer: Miramir is for real, but there are alot that make you wonder.
There are way more stranger names in the U.S for areas than Miramar. i think Miramar was a famous goat trainer or something. He deserved respect
